user.title: Set up Power Saver
user.description: Configure a power saver instance for an appliance. Select which Nord Pool sensor to use for price data.

data_description.nordpool_sensor: The Nord Pool sensor to use for electricity prices.
data_description.name: A descriptive name for this instance (e.g., 'Water Heater').
data_description.strategy: Lowest Price: activate cheapest hours within fixed time periods. Minimum Runtime: ensure a minimum number of hours are active within a rolling window.

lowest_price.title: Lowest Price Settings
lowest_price.description: Configure the time period and hours for price optimization. Set period from/to to the same value (e.g., both 00:00) for full-day optimization.

data_description.hours_per_period: Number of cheapest hours to activate within each period.
data_description.period_to: End of the optimization period. Supports cross-midnight periods (e.g., 22:00 to 06:00).
data_description.min_consecutive_hours: Minimum consecutive hours per active block. Prevents short on/off cycling. Leave empty to disable.

minimum_runtime.title: Minimum Runtime Settings
minimum_runtime.description: Configure the rolling window and minimum runtime for the device. The device will run for at least the minimum hours within each rolling window, at the cheapest available times.

data_description.min_hours_on: Total hours the device must run within each rolling window. Runtime is spread across the cheapest available slots. For example, 4 hours to properly heat a water tank.
data_description.rolling_window: Size of the rolling time window in hours. The device must run for at least the minimum hours within this window. For example, 28 hours means the device runs at least 4 hours (as per the example above) every 28 hours.
data_description.min_consecutive_hours: Minimum consecutive hours per active block. Prevents short on/off cycling. Leave empty to allow individual 15-minute slots.

common_options.title: Advanced Options
common_options.description: Configure price thresholds, time exclusions, and entity control.

data_description.selection_mode: Choose whether to activate the cheapest hours (default) or the most expensive hours. In 'Most expensive' mode the threshold roles described below are swapped.
data_description.always_cheap_price: Price below which the slot is always activated. In 'Most expensive' mode: never activate below this price. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.always_expensive_price: Price at or above which the slot is never activated. In 'Most expensive' mode: always activate above this price. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.price_similarity_pct: Also activate slots within this percentage of the cheapest price. In 'Most expensive' mode: computed from the most expensive price downward. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.exclude_from: Start of excluded time range. Slots during this period are never activated. Supports cross-midnight ranges (e.g., 22:00 to 06:00). Both fields must be set to enable. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.exclude_until: End of excluded time range. Both fields must be set to enable. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.controlled_entities: Entities to turn on/off when state changes. Leave empty to control via your own automations.

error.nordpool_not_found: No Nord Pool integration found. Please set up the Nord Pool integration (HACS or native) before configuring Power Saver.
error.already_configured: A power saver with this name and sensor is already configured.

abort.already_configured: This power saver instance is already configured.
